# ShinyIDEA

This repository contains the source code for ShinyIDEA.

ShinyIDEA is a web app aimed at making the tools developed in [{IDEATools}](https://github.com/davidcarayon/IDEATools) available to any user.

The app has been developed following the [golem](https://github.com/ThinkR-open/golem) framework.

The app is hosted on INRAE's servers and can be accessed [HERE](https://outils-idea.inrae.fr/).
